com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.checksettings

Interface CheckSettingsBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckSettingsBuilderImpl

    public interface CheckSettingsBuilder
    Use the CheckSettingsBuilder to create your check settings. You can change settings with successive calls to the same method. Use AcrolinxFactory.checkSettings() to get a new instance of CheckSettingsBuilder.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CheckSettings build()
      Build the check settings configured with the above methods.
      AdvancedCheckSettingsBuilder getAdvancedCheckSettingsBuilder() 
      CheckSettingsBuilder withGrammarChecking(boolean enabled)
      Enables grammar checking.
      Note: RuleSetCapabilities.isGrammarCheckingAvailable() must be true.
      CheckSettingsBuilder withLanguage(Language lang)
      Sets the checking Language.
      CheckSettingsBuilder withReportLanguage(Language language)
      Sets the report language.
      CheckSettingsBuilder withReuseChecking(boolean enabled)
      Enables Reuse checking.
      CheckSettingsBuilder withRuleSet(RuleSet ruleSet)
      Sets the checking RuleSet
      CheckSettingsBuilder withSEOChecking(boolean enabled)
      Enables search engine optimization checking.
      Note: RuleSetCapabilities.isSEOCheckingAvailable() must be true. You also have to define keywords using DocumentCheckSettingsBuilder.withKeywords(List).
      CheckSettingsBuilder withSpellChecking(boolean enabled)
      Enables spelling checking.
      Note: RuleSetCapabilities.isSpellCheckingAvailable() must be true.
      CheckSettingsBuilder withStyleChecking(boolean enabled)
      Enables style checking.
      Note: RuleSetCapabilities.isStyleCheckingAvailable() must be true.
      CheckSettingsBuilder withTermChecking(Set<TermStatus> termStatus, Set<TermSet> termSets)
      Enables term checking.
      CheckSettingsBuilder withTermHarvesting(boolean enabled)
      Enables term harvesting.

    • Method Detail

      • withLanguage

        CheckSettingsBuilder withLanguage(Language lang)
        Sets the checking Language.
        Parameters:
        lang - The checking language.
        Note: ServerCapabilities.getLanguageCapabilities() must contain the Language.
        Returns:
        an instance of the same CheckSettingsBuilder to allow chaining

      • withRuleSet

        CheckSettingsBuilder withRuleSet(RuleSet ruleSet)
        Sets the checking RuleSet
        Parameters:
        ruleSet - Sets the rule set.
        Note: LanguageCapabilities.getRuleSetCapabilities() must contain the RuleSet.
        Returns:
        an instance of the same CheckSettingsBuilder to allow chaining

      • withGrammarChecking

        CheckSettingsBuilder withGrammarChecking(boolean enabled)
        Enables grammar checking.
        Note: RuleSetCapabilities.isGrammarCheckingAvailable() must be true.
        Returns:
        an instance of the same CheckSettingsBuilder to allow chaining

      • withSEOChecking

        CheckSettingsBuilder withSEOChecking(boolean enabled)
        Enables search engine optimization checking.
        Note:
        • RuleSetCapabilities.isSEOCheckingAvailable() must be true.
        • You also have to define keywords using DocumentCheckSettingsBuilder.withKeywords(List).
        Returns:
        an instance of the same CheckSettingsBuilder to allow chaining

      • withSpellChecking

        CheckSettingsBuilder withSpellChecking(boolean enabled)
        Enables spelling checking.
        Note: RuleSetCapabilities.isSpellCheckingAvailable() must be true.
        Returns:
        an instance of the same CheckSettingsBuilder to allow chaining

      • withStyleChecking

        CheckSettingsBuilder withStyleChecking(boolean enabled)
        Enables style checking.
        Note: RuleSetCapabilities.isStyleCheckingAvailable() must be true.
        Returns:
        an instance of the same CheckSettingsBuilder to allow chaining

      • withReuseChecking

        CheckSettingsBuilder withReuseChecking(boolean enabled)
        Enables Reuse checking.
        Note: RuleSetCapabilities.isReuseCheckingAvailable() must be true.
        Returns:
        an instance of the same CheckSettingsBuilder to allow chaining

      • withTermHarvesting

        CheckSettingsBuilder withTermHarvesting(boolean enabled)
        Enables term harvesting.
        Note: RuleSetCapabilities.isTermHarvestingAvailable() must be true for the RuleSet and Privileges.hasRunTermHarvesting().
        Returns:
        an instance of the same CheckSettingsBuilder to allow chaining

      • withTermChecking

        CheckSettingsBuilder withTermChecking(Set<TermStatus> termStatus,
                                    Set<TermSet> termSets)
        Enables term checking.
        Parameters:
        termStatus - Terms with this status should be flagged. You usually check for deprecated and admitted terms (see TermStatus).
        Note: RuleSetCapabilities.getAvailableTermSets() must contain elements. Otherwise term checking is disabled.
        termSets - the name of the term sets that should be used for the check.
        Note: RuleSetCapabilities.getAvailableTermSets() must contain the termSets.
        Returns:
        an instance of the same ICheckSettingsBuilder to allow chaining

      • getAdvancedCheckSettingsBuilder

        AdvancedCheckSettingsBuilder getAdvancedCheckSettingsBuilder()
        Returns:
        a builder for setting advanced settings. See AdvancedCheckSettingsBuilder

      • withReportLanguage

        CheckSettingsBuilder withReportLanguage(Language language)
        Sets the report language. The checking report generated by the Acrolinx Server will be localized in this language. If no language is set, the default is English.
        Returns:
        an instance of the same CheckSettingsBuilder to allow chaining

      • build

        CheckSettings build()
        Build the check settings configured with the above methods.
